price: Ya ce: "Wani abinci bã zai zo muku ba wanda ake azurtã ku da shi fãce nã bã ku lãbãrin fassararsa,* kãfin ya zo muku. Wannan kuwa yanã daga abin da Ubangijĩna Ya sanar da ni. Lalle ne nĩ nã bar addinin mutãne waɗanda ba su yi ĩmãni da Allah ba, kuma game da lãhira, sũ kãfirai ne."
arabic: قَالَ لَا يَأۡتِيكُمَا طَعَامٞ تُرۡزَقَانِهِۦٓ إِلَّا نَبَّأۡتُكُمَا بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمَاۚ ذَٰلِكُمَا مِمَّا عَلَّمَنِي رَبِّيٓۚ إِنِّي تَرَكۡتُ مِلَّةَ قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
footnotes: * Kõwane irin abin ne kãfin in gan shi da idõna, zan iya gaya muku nau'insa, kamar yadda Ĩsa ya ce: " Inã bã ku lãbãrin abin da kuke ci a gidãjenku." A Sũrar Ãl Imrãna ãyã ta 49.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā yatīkumā ṭaʿāmun tur'zaqānihi illā nabbatukumā bitawīlihi qabla an yatiyakumā dhālikumā mimmā ʿallamanī rabbī innī taraktu millata qawmin lā yu'minūna bil-lahi wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
translations: I will inform both of you
